item.title: Vim cheatsheet
item.author: Author
item.description: Preliminaries I use neovim. My configuration is here. There, I map <esc> to jk, a mapping I also use throughout this file. I’ve remaped Caps Look to <ctrl> on my mac. Quarto setup <shift-k> to open help on object under cursor, <shift-kk> to ender help window, q to quit help. Terminal: open new terminal with <leader>c, then activate terminal by going into insert mode and going back to normal mode with usual keybinding.
